overview: Dystopia series concert day 2, Saturday 27th of March 2021.  Dreamcatcher performs top hits from their discography with the rock sound that only dreamcatcher can bring to life.  All the 7 members showcases their powerful vocals with a live band, and captivates you with dynamic choreography, all with the familiar backtracks of electric guitars and hard-hitting drums.  Join them as they run from dystopia and conclude the trilogy part dystopia series.
tagline: Second Day of Dreamcatcher's 3rd Online Concert that Concludes the Dystopia Series
title: Dreamcatcher [Crossroads: Part 2. Dystopia]
